Name: Unit 404
About the game: 'Unit 404' is a sci-fi puzzle platformer game. Find a way out of the abandoned sci-fi complex through solving various puzzles. The game has more than 70 handcrafted levels with various game mechanics and visual themes. The difficulty keeps growing as you progress through the game.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Unit 404? Check out the release date (Aug 20, 2020), developer insights from [OneManBand], and a complete game summary.
